name: 1parkplace
overview:
1parkplace Background – Real Estate Marketing Experts

Creators of award-winning real estate marketing technology and real estate lead generation solutions.

In today’s crowded real estate technology market, realtors & brokers are faced with an array of tools and products that make claims to flood an agent with new leads, improve a process or dominate a market.

The challenge realtors and brokers face is how to put these pieces together and develop an approach to get the most out of their marketing and technology investment.

Most real estate agents and brokers will agree that learning new computer programs are a good concept, however, it just doesn’t happen without a solid plan and accountability partner.

1parkplace offers an array of solutions to support every professional. Professional Consultation and business incubation:

Real estate marketing consultation
Strategic real estate business planning
Real estate Search Engine Optimization (SEO) & Pay Per Click (PPC) programs
Ghost blogging services
Real estate team building strategies
Real estate recruiting and retention strategies
Real estate training and education
Top 5 in real estate consultation

State of the art technology solutions:

Contact management systems
MLS IDX real estate lead generation systems
High performance REALTOR® websites
Industry leading real estate blogs
Real estate agent websites systems
Real estate team websites, blogs and management systems
Real estate brokerage firm technology systems
Top 5 in real estate technology systems

Areas of expertise

Real estate marketing strategy
eMarketing solutions
eCommerce and transaction management systems
Database systems and integration
Extend and convert existing legacy systems to the web
Network architecture and high security design solutions
